org.tms.api.io

Class HTMLOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tms.io.options.BaseIOOptions<T>
      • org.tms.io.options.StyledPageIOOptions<T>
        • org.tms.io.options.TitledPageIOOptions<HTMLOptions>
          • org.tms.api.io.HTMLOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOOption<HTMLOptions>, StyleableIOOption<HTMLOptions>, TitleableIOOption<HTMLOptions>

    public class HTMLOptions
extends org.tms.io.options.TitledPageIOOptions<HTMLOptions>
implements TitleableIOOption<HTMLOptions>, IOOption<HTMLOptions>
    HTMLOptions is a concrete class for representing configuration options to export Tables in HTML format.

    Since:
    "1.1"
    Version:
    "1.3"

    • Field Detail

      • Default

        public static final HTMLOptions Default
        Constant with the most common HTML export configuration options already set. The values for the various configuration options are defined as follows:
        • Row Labels: true
        • Column Labels: true
        • Ignore Empty Rows: false
        • Ignore Empty Columns: false
        • Default Column Width: 65px
        • Default Font Size: 12px
        • Default Font Family: Arial

        To include these default values when exporting to HTML, simply include HTMLOptions.Default in the import factory method or supporting TableElement export method.

        See Also:
        Table#export(String, IOOption), Table#export(java.io.OutputStream, IOOption), Row#export(String, IOOption), Row#export(java.io.OutputStream, IOOption), Column#export(String, IOOption), Column#export(java.io.OutputStream, IOOption), Subset#export(String, IOOption), Subset#export(java.io.OutputStream, IOOption)
